p:
The DFT calculations were run using the GPAW code-package
33 with the grid spacing of 0.2Å and Perdew-Burke-Ernzerhof (PBE) xc-functional
34 . The total energies were calculated without structure relaxation from a set of 700 generated model structures of both Au 36(SR) 24 and Ag 44(SR) 30 4− clusters by adding the ligands as simplified SH-groups in the most natural bonding direction using the optimal bond distance. Total energies were used for studying the correlation to the CSE, which was averaged in increments of 0.4 eV of total energy.
